short_description: joy of communication is a language & speaking school based in united kingdom.
long_description: i grew up in cambridge, uk, brought up by an english mother and indian father and for several years, we hosted international students who were learning english in cambridge. i discovered my passion for working in the field of intercultural communication whilst attending a 'developing intercultural competence' course and went on to complete a pg cert. in intercultural communication. my work in education led me to delivering presentations and training sessions in english and spanish in the following countries: spain, portugal, switzerland, dubai, turkey and mexico. intercultural communication focusses on being aware of our own identity and culture first, before exploring other cultures. by providing engaging activities, time for reflection and sharing experiences, individuals and groups can become more self-aware, make improvements to their communication skills and implement positive changes when communicating with others. improving our global communication skills is an essential and continuous journey.
business_tags: intercultural communication | communication workshops | help/customer service | cross cultural communication | coaching sessions | identity & culture | groups & activities | cultural intelligence | working & living | engagement workshops | learning english | teaching english | registration manager | development management
generated_description: joy of communication is a company based in cambridge, england, that provides training workshops to improve awareness and communication skills across cultures. the company focuses on helping individual and group participants, as well as customer service professionals working internationally, to communicate more effectively. their services include workshops, consultancy, and 1:1 coaching sessions aimed at enhancing intercultural competence, customer service excellence, and inclusive communication. joy of communication emphasizes the importance of understanding cultural differences and adapting communication styles to achieve better relationships and outcomes.
